page.title: 07SCHOOL CLUBS
page.content: At Yattendon C.M.{School}we have lots of{clubs,}many of which are sports. They include cricket,football,hockey, athletics, gymnastics, basketball, netball and cross-country. There are also many creative arts clubs. These are school magazine, pottery, drama, dance and various forms of music, these being recorder playing, choir, windband, orchestra, violin and guitar. There is a very good selection and most of the children find them enjoyable. As well as school clubs, we have residential and Environmental Studies trips. The 1st and 2nd Years camp at High Ashurst,Box Hill. 3rd Years camp at Penlan, Wales and Hindleap which have different activities. 4th Years camp in France at Montreuil and at Blacklands Farm. They all have a lot of fun whilst learning new things.
